roleset.name: get closer to, menacingly
roleset.note: ENCROACH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encroach' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from encroach.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Roederer Cristal at $90 a bottle sells out around the country and Taittinger's Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs is encroaching upon that level.
example.arg: Taittinger's Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs
